review: **** **** ******** Gives you information and makes you feel very comfortable. All necessary precautions have been taken, and all dentists are in masks and with protective gear.
Inspite of a contingency, measurements were taken. Schedule kept. No time lost for customer. With all the extra care needed in these difficult times
